author: rubys
msg: Switch to unbundled jar.  Mark the contents of the bundle as runtime,
so projects which depend on the full set can simply indicate this by
adding inherit="runtime" to their dependency.  Thanks, Leo Simons!

author: costin
msg: jtc no longer has tomcat5 specific code, so I removed the jakarta-tomcat-coyote-tc5.
Also removed some unused deps (avalon). It seems to work now - waiting for velocity
fix that will allow mx4j to build.
